comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -19176,11 +19176,14 @@ charismanews.com#$##headerAreaWrap { height: 180px !important; }
 !
 ! check-host.net
 ! Make sure that https://check-host.net/about/api is not broken
-/^https:\/\/check-host\.net\/images\/[a-z]+-(en|ru)\.png$/$domain=check-host.net
-check-host.net##div[class*="-f"]:has(> * > img[src*=".svg"])
-check-host.net#%#//scriptlet('trusted-set-cookie', 'closet_advertisments', 'privatealps,alexhost,pp-liaryt2,pp-liaryt,u1host-rep,waic-b')
-check-host.net###amain > div:has(a[href*="pq.hosting"])
-||check-host.net/images/*.png?
+check-host.net#?#[class] > [src*=".svg"]:upward(2)
comment.body: I tried using `:has()` at first, but I changed it to `:upward()` as I was having some problems with false positives. The goal of the rule was to not rely on class names other than `.svg`

pull_request.title: Fix #165624 check-host.net

issue.title: www.gardenwildlifedirect.co.uk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gardenwildlifedirect.co.uk/checkout](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gardenwildlifedirect.co.uk%2Fcheckout) ### Comment > I originally came across this issue in uBlock Origin (you'll see i have it installed but disabled). > > By using the logger function in uBlock i was able to narrow it down to the Filter List 'AdGuard - Cookie Notices' and the Amasty GDPR extension. Specifically the filter: > /amasty_gdprfrontendui/* ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/o6jatgw7m2skoo008oso4w0w4884wsomumtpnjx800.png?nc=1)

issue.title: nust.edu.pk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://nust.edu.pk/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnust.edu.pk%2F)
### Comment
> Whenever Adguard Default Public DNS is configured in Chrome's own settings (DNS over HTTPS), the mentioned website doesn't load BUT when the Adguard Default Public DNS is configured in Android's Private DNS settings, the website loads successfully.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/91ilywumcsw8o0gksso800coccw04s8m6xa3duoea8.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled</summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/eip1rpcannk0kocc84ooskcscc4ksso7eysutlg9so.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Chrome Browser
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Android 13`
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: nust.edu.pk
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://nust.edu.pk/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnust.edu.pk%2F)
### Comment
> Whenever Adguard Default Public DNS is configured in Chrome's own settings (DNS over HTTPS), the mentioned website doesn't load BUT when the Adguard Default Public DNS is configured in Android's Private DNS settings, the website loads successfully.

### Screenshots
<details>
  <summary>Screenshot 1 </summary>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/91ilywumcsw8o0gksso800coccw04s8m6xa3duoea8.png?nc=1)
</details>
<details>

  ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/eip1rpcannk0kocc84ooskcscc4ksso7eysutlg9so.png?nc=1)
</details>

### System configuration

Information | Value
--- | ---
AdGuard product: | AdGuard DNS
DNS setup: | Chrome Browser
DNS server: | AdGuard DNS Default server
System version: | `Android 13`
Browser: | Chrome

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://nust.edu.pk/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fnust.edu.pk%2F) ### Comment > This issue was also experienced while Adguard Default Public DNS was configured. issue.title: 4pda.to

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://decrypt.day/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdecrypt.day%2F) ### Comment > Trying to download some files in this website, and it is blocked due to adblock detection. > Stop filtering 30 sec does not resolve, but pause Adguard allow me to download. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/9jfm2vl2u24osg8go8g4kscs84skgc4j1q8b1zsu9k.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.2.1984 release System version: | `MacOS 15.6(빌드 24G84)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your IP address (223.63.0.1),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
